name: Wally's World Quiz | DC Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Wally married his longtime girlfriend Linda Park. What was her occupation at the time?
questions.explanation:
Reporter.

	Linda iinitially didn't like the Flash, but later ended up dating and marrying him. She gave birth to twins, after one miscarriage caused by Professor Zoom.

questions.text: Before he was the Flash, Wally was Kid Flash, sidekick to Barry Allen's Flash. What were the primary colors of his costume?
questions.explanation:
Yellow and red.

	As Kid Flash, Wally wore a yellow suit with red gloves, boots and pants. The thunderbolt insignia was also red, whereas on the Flash's costume, it was yellow.

questions.text: For a time after Barry Allen's death during "Crises on Infinite Earths", Wally had a limit on his speed powers. What was it?
questions.correct: He could only run as fast as the speed of sound.
options: He could only run as fast as the speed of light
He could only run for five minutes at a time
He could only run for ten minutes at a time.
questions.explanation:
He could only run as fast as the speed of sound.

	Wally was afraid of replacing his uncle, whom he admired greatly. This mental block kept him from reaching his full potential and only matching the speed of sound when using his powers.

questions.text: Wally realized his full potential during a battle with Kobra.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It was during a fight with Eobard Thawne, the Reverse-Flash, that Wally was able to break his mental block and match the speeds of his uncle and mentor, Barry Allen.

questions.text: Who was West's best friend on the Justice League?
questions.explanation:
Kyle Rayner.

	West had grown up with Hal Jordan as Green Lantern and was initially wary of Rayner's assumption of that title. Given time, they became excellent friends and partners.

questions.text: Upon assuming the role of the Flash, Wally West kept his identity hidden.
questions.explanation:
False.

	In order to not replace his uncle in the mind of the public, Wally West revealed his identity. This put his loved ones in danger, and the evil Professor Zoom caused Linda to miscarry. The Spectre removed the knowledge from everyone's mind, including Wally's!

questions.text: During "Infinite Crisis", Wally joined with other super-speedsters to defeat which hero gone rogue?
questions.explanation:
Superboy-Prime.

	Wally, Bart Allen and Jay Garrick all fought Superboy-Prime, using their speed to keep him in check. They were only able to hold him for a short time, and Superboy-Prime was eventually defeated by the two Supermen.

questions.text: In the "Justice League" and "Justice League Unlimited" animated series, who voices Wally West?
questions.explanation:
Michael Rosenbaum.

	Rosenbaum also played a young Lex Luthor on the series "Smallville". In both animated series he is often seen making wisecracks and annoying other members of the team.

questions.text: Wally West has a slew of inventive villains. Which one of these no-goodniks later had a change of heart?
questions.explanation:
Pied Piper.

	Hartley Rathaway used to be the criminal known as the Pied Piper, but later reformed, becoming a valuable ally to West on many occasions. He also was one of DC Comics' first openly gay characters.

questions.text: In which country did Wally's father die?
questions.explanation:
Cuba.

	Rudolph West was a Manhunter agent who died defending Cuba during the events of the "Invasion" storyline, which featured a number of alien races invading Earth.
